author: lundblad
msg: Fix switch --relocate, where it could (still) lead to an invalid repository
root in the entries file.  This is fixing a corner case for issue #1859.
(where /a was not part of thre repository root) didn't fail as it should.
(relocate_entry): Change signature to use non-deprecated typedef.
Make sure that the new repository root really is a repository root.
(svn_wc_relocate2): New.  Copied from svn_wc_relocate, adjusting the
(validator_baton_t): Change url_uuids member from hash table to array.  (It
(validator_func): Rework to validate repository root and be more
(svn_client_relocate): Create an array instead of hash table in the baton.
(relocate_beyond_repos_root): Extend to catch the bug we're fixing.
